title: Max & Lily Low Loft Bed, Twin Bed Frame For Kids With Stairs, White
features: Superior Quality: Solid, knot free, New Zealand pine wood bed frame. Durable, non-toxic, low VOC finish
Sturdy & Stable: High, 400-pound resting weight capacity per sleeping surface. Strong plywood slats with metal support bar
Modern, Clean Design: Slatted headboard with flush, color matching hardware for a clean finish
Stable: metal on metal structural connections won't loosen over time

Space-saving: loft design opens up floor space. Total footprint (including staircase) 99.5"L X 42.5"W X 50"H; Actual bed measurements excluding staircase 81.5" X 42.5" X 50" In (LxWxH). at 50 Inches high its ideal for low ceilings. Underbed height is 33.25 Inches. Extra space for storage in built-in staircase shelves
Versatile: staircase can be installed on left or right hand side during assembly
Generous 14-inch safety guard rails. For best fit and safety, use with a 5-inch-thick mattress. Do not exceed a mattress thickness of 8 inches

Designed to accommodate standard twin size mattress; we recommend a 5 inch mattress and not to exceed 8-inch-thick mattress. Plywood slats included; no box spring or bunkie board required. Mattress and bedding not included
This bed meets or exceeds federal safety standards for children’s furniture
description: Plenty of room for sleep and play? Now that’s a win-win! The Max & Lily Twin Low Loft Bed with Staircase is the perfect combination of functional and fun that both kids and parents love. Only 50 inches high, this space-saving low loft design is great for smaller spaces and safe for younger children. Top bed features tall 14” guardrails, so the bed safely fits standard mattress sizes. Staircase with rounded edges offers comfortable, easy climbing. Added bonus - staircase is reversible and removable, so it is flexible to work with any space. Solid, knot-free New Zealand pine wood adds strength and stability. All Max & Lily products use a durable, low VOC finish. The slatted head and footboards and flush, color-matched hardware give this low loft bed a clean, modern look. Instructions, slat roll, and required hardware are included. With solid plywood slats and a metal support bar for the top bed, this sleeping surface can support 400 pounds of resting weight. This bed meets or exceeds Federal safety standards for kids furniture. When it’s time for play, this low loft bed’s space saving design frees up plenty of floor space. 2+ adults make assembly simple and easy. Add play curtains or slide (purchase separately) to add even more fun to your room. The Twin Low Loft Bed with Staircase from Max & Lily offers exceptional quality and affordability that kids and their parents will enjoy for years to come. Max & Lily is a member of the Maxwood family of brands - the kids furniture experts bringing a tradition of superior quality, safety and fun!
